tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE algorithms (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
CREATE TABLE algorithms ( algorithm_id INT PRIMARY KEY, algorithm_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, author VARCHAR(255) )
CREATE TABLE authors ( author_id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255) )

CREATE TABLE algorithm_relationships (
    relationship_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT NOT NULL,
    related_algorithm_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES algorithms_metadata(algorithm_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (related_algorithm_id) REFERENCES algorithms_metadata(algorithm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_categories (
    algorithm_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (algorithm_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES algorithms (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories (id)
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_authors (
    algorithm_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (algorithm_id, author_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (algorithm_id) REFERENCES algorithms (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors (id)
);
